Class MemoryPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container

                  org.schwering.evi.util.MemoryPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class MemoryPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A JPanel that shows frequently updated memory information.

Version:
$Id: MemoryPanel.java 130 2006-05-22 11:38:30Z schwering $
Author:
Christoph Schwering (mailto:schwering@gmail.com)

BAR

public static final int BAR
If enabled with bitwise or (|) in options, a bar is shown.

If enabled with bitwise or (|) in options, a label is shown.

Constant Field Values

BUTTON

public static final int BUTTON
If enabled with bitwise or (|) in options, a button is shown.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

MemoryPanel

public MemoryPanel()
Creates a new JPanel with memory information. The panel has a label, a bar and a button to collect (options = BAR | LABEL | COLLECT).

MemoryPanel

public MemoryPanel(int options)
Creates a new JPanel with memory information.

Parameters:
options - The options, for example BAR | LABEL | BUTTON to display the bar, the label and the "collect"-button.

stop

public void stop()
Stops the thread.
